title: Can I complete a 4-year Computer Science degree in less than 2 years? - Quora

response.answer_text: A USA 4-year bachelor’s degree? No. You might be able to do it in roughly 3 years if you take a full load of courses each summer. You might be able to shorten that even further if you take more than a full load of courses each term. Still you’re likely looking at at least 2 1/2 years. And that’s for the extraordinary student who doesn’t have time to even sleep for that period.

No. Not all of it. 100%. Impossible. If you could it wouldn't be a real 4 year degree. Anyone saying otherwise likely doesn't have a STEM degree from an accredited university. Assuming you are talking about a degree in the USA that is.

At certain schools (usually not the best ones) with year round classes taking max loads… maybe. It is usually a very bad idea. You don’t learn as much, your electives are very restricted. Very high stress. And usually a weaker degree too.
